title: Struggling to find peers
body:
Node is struggling to find more than a few peers (6).
Before the merge when I ran my ETH node, it was very easy to find peers, not sure what I am doing wrong here:

Geth Version:
instance: Geth/v1.10.25-stable-69568c55/linux-amd64/go1.18.5

Launch Commands:
```
ExecStart=geth --datadir /home/ethereum/execution --cache=64000 --http --http.api eth,net,engine,admin --metrics --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs --txlookuplimit 0 --ws --ws.addr 0.0.0.0 --ws.origins '*' --ws.api eth,net,web3,txpool,debug --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs --txlookuplimit 0 --maxpeers 200
```

In Sync:
```
Oct 11 12:40:25 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base geth[4526]: INFO [10-11|12:40:25.054] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed="161.543µs" number=15,724,926 hash=db7748..a49e98
Oct 11 12:40:28 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base geth[4526]: INFO [10-11|12:40:28.207] Downloader queue stats                   receiptTasks=0    blockTasks=0    itemSize=223.18KiB throttle=1175
Oct 11 12:40:35 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base geth[4526]: INFO [10-11|12:40:35.933] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=15,724,927 hash=cac333..4adf57
Oct 11 12:40:37 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base geth[4526]: INFO [10-11|12:40:37.055] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed="145.593µs" number=15,724,927 hash=cac333..4adf57
```

Consenus running aswell: 
```
[2022-10-11 12:39:12]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=121 payloadHash=0x875512d39f6a slot=4888994 syncBitsCount=505 txCount=194
```

Port 30303 open: 
```
tcp6       0      0 :::30303                :::*                    LISTEN      7553/geth


udp          UNCONN        0             0                                   *:30303                            *:*            users:(("geth",pid=7553,fd=238))
tcp          LISTEN        0             4096                                *:30303                            *:*            users:(("geth",pid=7553,fd=237))
```

What else could be the problem here?


-----------------
Second random question:

"State Sync" seems like it will take several months to complete, what is it and how can I disable this?
```
Oct 11 12:53:19 Ubuntu-2204-jammy-amd64-base geth[7553]: INFO [10-11|12:53:19.970] State sync in progress                   synced=14.76% state=30.78GiB accounts=27,599,306@6.27GiB slots=118,186,578@23.80GiB codes=133,266@733.39MiB eta=28m23.589s
```
Any help is appreciated, thanks!

`eta=28m23.589s` -- it's estimating to finish in 28 minutes. What's the problem? 
Generally though, 1.11 is better than `1.10.25`, and `--maxpeers 200` might be self-DOS. It'd keep the closer to the defaults
